website_summaries.verdict: Although the actual quercetin content is a little lower, this option is enhanced with additional flavonoids for an extra antioxidant punch.
pros: Formulated with pH neutral vitamin C to make it easier on the stomach – ideal for those who don't tolerate vitamin C well
Contains additional flavonoids and natural extracts, including bromelain
Users report fast and effective relief from allergies and inflammation
cons: A few reports of damaged bottles

customer_reviews.title: This product caused me to severely bleed. I could ...
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me to severely bleed. I could not figure it out at first why I was having severe uterine bleeding and blood clots the size of my fist. Dr's were donfused too but then I realized when I took this, I would bleed heavy. Turns out the ingredients in this are known to cause this issue!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Not many realize that Quercetin is not just a bioflavinoid. It is a very powerful anti-viral! Cures the common cold and helps with all manner of other viruses. I rely on it very heavily as it's the only thing that works except for prevention.
customer_reviews.author: Periphery

customer_reviews.title: Great quercetin supplement!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful well made product. I use it to help my allergy and mast cell activation disorder issues. No bad taste and the bonus is that it also has vitamin c which also helps allergy sufferers. I recommend this to others. I actually missed taking this over a weekend and my symptoms started coming back so I resumed and started feeling better again which makes me a huge believer and supporter of this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. 302

customer_reviews.title: I like this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this supplement for about ten years. I have no scientific basis to claim any benefits, only personal experience. Prior to my taking this, I would catch a bad cold about four times a year (a cold in which I would lose time from work). I now average a bad cold about once every few years. I also have a lot less knee pain. I cannot absolutely attribute this to quercetin. It may only be a coincidence.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Godby

customer_reviews.title: A student -- who now owns a GNC -- recommended this exact formula to me about 5 years ago ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has cured half my allergies. A student -- who now owns a GNC -- recommended this exact formula to me about 5 years ago and I've been taking it every day since -- except for the days I miss and notice.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: No more eczema!
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema. Since taking this product, I haven't had a flare up and also haven't had a sinus infection.
customer_reviews.author: Roanie1012

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Loratadine
customer_reviews.text: I think these really work. I have chronic rhinitis and am allergic to night air and a host of pollens. I started about four months ago and it's initially not that easy to tell how well they might be working (sinuses are constantly changing their behavior day-to-day and week-to-week) but over time I would have to say that my sinuses went from 4th gear to 2nd gear. I still occasionally use nose spray but I've literally stopped needing Loratadine for three months now, when I would previously need it once or more each week.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT A SATISFACTORY AMAZON CHOICE!!
customer_reviews.text: This item made me very sick!! Cramping in my stomach, it also caused me within two days to be severely constipated. I didn't take four pills daily as recommended. I started with two pills in the morning with breakfast. I actually only took four pills in two days. I would like to return this item as I am so dissatisfied with it's results.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Has there been a formula change?
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this particular brand for quite some time after trying many others. I like that it is in a glass tinted bottle...and I always liked that it worked well for me... Either I have built up an immunity to it or the formula has changed. I have noticed that my current bottle is more creamy than yellow in color .... did not think that much about it until I have noticed it not working quite as well...????
customer_reviews.author: burkehart

customer_reviews.title: The granddaddy of vitamin companies
customer_reviews.text: Being an advocate of vitamins and holistic healing since the early 70s a lot of people new to vitamins and biotin Amazon don't realize that solgar has always been since the beginning the Rolls-Royce of vitamin companies. I did absolutely nothing paid for for writing a good review it's just a simple fact. As far as I'm concerned their is "Solgar" and then everyone else. I'm sure there's a lot of soup organic boutique companies that charge a lot of money that are probably equally well I haven't tested all of them.I truly believe that they're in a class of their own with high standards before even high standards were an issue. By with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio M.

customer_reviews.title: Candida overgrowth
customer_reviews.text: I have been battling candida overgrowth and quercetin has helped lighten the symptoms a little... I have noticed less anxiety/ depression and an overall better mood. I take two with breakfast and two at night.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Hair growth
customer_reviews.text: After years of alopecia, I see hair growth in areas I thought were hopeless. I use it orally and topically. To use topically you will have to open the capsule and mix it with oil or what ever scalp/hair ointment or conditioner and message it into the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Meachem

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised & is highly recommended as 1 of several supplements for the Covid-19. I have developed my own cocktail but this product is one of them and I would not change. I am a 74 year old male with many preexisting conditions. Please take my word that this product is a must for any combination you use based on solid due diligence.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Adams

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: It says to take twice a day but I usually take them in the morning & I could say that after 2 weeks of use my allergies had reduced, I barely had gotten sick after I started taking this, now I skip 1 or 2 days and I could say that it still do the work. It also helped me gain more energy and be more focused on my work. Yes! I will still purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Karelisse

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a glass bottle that was crushed. Obviously I cannot take these pills that are covered in glass pieces. Refund or return is not permitted. Really!!

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies and dietary intolerance
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to other similar products. I take this supplement to control severe allergic reactions and subsequent digestive issues. Since adding this to my medication regime, I was able to drastically reduce my intake of daily allergy meds and my allergic reactions have all but disappeared. Great product! Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: WOW it is a great tool in this flu season. I am old and my diet never contains enough C.
customer_reviews.author: B. C.

customer_reviews.title: Helps me!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using various brands of quercetin for my seasonal allergies for a few years now (I want to say four but I haven't carefully kept track if I'm honest.) This brand works well and contains Ester C which I also like. I haven't done any scientific experiments on myself to get hard data about its efficacy but I can absolutely tell when I don't take it for a few days during allergy season because my symptoms worsen - even if it's a placebo effect I'll take it versus the horrible sneezing, watery eyes, and general feeling of malaise. I usually only take one a day but I increase to the full dosage on the package if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Zoya

customer_reviews.title: Great product! It's working better than other quercetin products ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It's working better than other quercetin products I've used and I love the added vitamin C (which I actually seem to be absorbing! Most of the time vitamin c doesn't agree with me). Taking as part of a regimen to heal my gut and lower inflammation in my body.

Also, I am skeptical of the safety of plastic containers for food and supplement products.

I've been taking this product for about a month and it feels as if my shoulder is slowly beginning to heal. I'm back to being able to do pushups. I'm hoping over time, my shoulder will completely heal without having surgery.

Sinus infection, upper respitory infections that seemed like they kept coming back. I even had a bout with Epstein Barr. But most importantly, I had serious gut issues. I was in one of those awful cycles of pain, and intermittent viral infections that just wouldn't end. SO I looked for the best standardized, non-gmo, organic suppliment I could find. This is natures steroid for me... only doesn't mess with you. I take it periodically when I start feeling achey or when the kids go back to school in the fall and clear through march. Helps so much!

customer_reviews.title: Exciting research is happening with quercetin. I'm willing to try it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought several bottles of this because I've been reading about the Covid19 trials that will be happening in China with quercetin. Researchers at the Clinical Research Institute of Montreal (IRCM) believe that quercetin is a “broad spectrum” antiviral drug that could fight a range of viruses. The clinical trials in China will involve oral supplements taken four times a day with infected patients. The clinical trials have not happened yet, but it sounds promising and this supplement has few side effects. So, I'm taking a chance and having a few bottles on hand in case anyone in my family gets sick. It's also a bonus that this manufacturer includes Ester-C which is also good for immune support.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for allergy relieve for me and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for allergy relieve for me and my 9 year old son. I take 4 pills per day. My son takes 2 pills per day.
customer_reviews.author: Lana D

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says this really helps lessen her allergy symptoms. She gives it to her two dogs, who have sensitive skin, and says it helps them too. How 'bout that?!
customer_reviews.author: Jajh

customer_reviews.title: Sour milk smell.
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like sour milk when I opened bottle. I have bought this before and it had little or no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more breakthrough allergy symptoms!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I still take conventional allergy medicine, this quercetin keeps my allergies from breaking through. I've always had severe headaches, earaches and toothaches because of allergies. This makes it so I don't have them. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. Parker

product_meta.title: Solgar Quercetin Complex with Ester-C® Plus, Unique Synergistic Formulat Immune Health Support, 100 Vegetable Capsules
feature_bullets: Antioxidant; Quercetin is found in onions and other foods; It possesses antioxidant properties, which help to fight free radicals
Immune Health Support; Solgar Quercetin Complex includes the important bioflavonoid Quercetin in a synergistic formula with Ester-C Plus to provide immune health support

Gentle On The Stomach; Ester-C Plus provides a unique, pH neutral (non-acidic), form of vitamin C that is gentle on the stomach; Ester-C Plus offers the additional benefits of incorporating acerola berry, citrus bioflavonoids, rutin and rose hips

Non-GMO, Gluten, Wheat & Dairy Free; Solgar Quercetin Complex is suitable for vegans and free of: gluten, wheat, dairy, soy, yeast, sugar, sodium, artificial flavor, sweetener, preservatives, and color

The Gold Standard: For over 70 years, Solgar has been committed to quality, health, and well-being. Our mission is to create the finest nutritional supplements in small batches, through tireless research, using only the finest raw materials
